feature_model.name: Configuration
feature_model.feature_tree: :r Configuration (f_Configuration) :m Input (f_Input) :m Output (f_Output) :m FIRE-ALARM SYSTEM (f_FIRE_ALARM_SYSTEM) :m Devices (f_Devices) :g [1, 1] : Low-end systems (f_Low_end_systems) :m ConventionalI (f_ConventionalI) :m ConventionalO (f_ConventionalO) :g [1, *] : Temperature (f_Temperature) : Smoke sensor (f_Smoke_sensor) :g [1, *] : Alarm texts on display (f_Alarm_texts_on_display) : Alarm bell (f_Alarm_bell) : High-end systems (f_High_end_systems) :m AdvanceO (f_AdvanceO) :m AdvanceI (f_AdvanceI) :g [1, *] : High-speed stinguisher system (f_High_speed_stinguisher_system) : Automatic alert (f_Automatic_alert) :g [1, *] : Laser smoke (f_Laser_smoke) : Ultra-sensitivelaser (f_Ultra_sensitivelaser)
